word: H1633 - גָּרַם - gâram - gaw-ram' - Gnaw the bones - எலும்புகளைக் கடி

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Gnaw the bones / எலும்புகளைக் கடி
1) to cut off, to reserve, to lay aside, to leave, to save; (Qal) to reserve
2) (Piel) to break bones, to gnaw bones, to break

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to be spare or skeleton like; used only as a denominative from H1634; (causatively) to bone, that is, denude (by extension craunch) the bones: - gnaw the bones, break.
Cognate: H1633, H1634, H1636
